title: The Artground at Goodman Arts Centre - Lost Islands
blurb: Arts space for families to discover, learn, be curious.
description: The Artground is an accessible arts space where families can feel at ease, spend time, discover, learn, and be curious. It opens its doors to different communities, providing positive experiences to enrich and brighten their day. The space is sanitised and reset between each time-slot. Pre-booking tickets is recommended, though walk-ins are allowed if slots are available. The venue is closed to the public during weekday morning school excursions, selected public holidays, and private events. Admission charges apply, with different rates for weekdays and weekends/public holidays/school holidays. CHAS card holders enjoy free admission.

title: Wild Wonders @ Bird Paradise Adventure
blurb: Feathered Mystery Adventure at Bird Paradise awaits!
description: Unleash your child’s inner wildlife detective as they hunt clues, meet amazing birds, and discover surprising connections between birds and humans - all in a fun, interactive game at Bird Paradise! This family-friendly adventure encourages exploration and learning about the avian world. Children will engage in activities that promote observation skills and problem-solving. The experience is designed to be both educational and entertaining, making it a memorable outing for families. Discover the wonders of birds and their relationship with humans through this interactive adventure.
keyword tag: bird, nature, zoo, wildlife, safari, animals

title: Singapore Zoo: Wildlife Access and Family Fun
blurb: Enjoy wildlife access with savings for the family.
description: Explore diverse wildlife from around the globe in immersive habitats. The Singapore Zoo offers engaging experiences for families, including animal encounters, feeding sessions, and educational shows. Discover fascinating creatures and learn about conservation efforts in a lush, natural environment. Perfect for a family day out, the zoo provides a memorable and educational experience for all ages. Observe animals in open enclosures, participate in interactive exhibits, and enjoy the beauty of nature. The zoo is committed to providing a safe and enjoyable environment for all visitors, with various amenities and facilities available.

title: Wild Wonders @ Singapore Zoo
blurb: Let your knowledge of the animal kingdom shine!
description: Step into the wild as the Singapore Zoo transforms into a living, breathing game board. In Wild Wonders: The Ultimate Animal Showdown, your child becomes a wildlife strategist - choosing animal teammates, completing fun missions across the zoo, and building the ultimate trump card deck. It’s a high-energy, brain-boosting adventure packed with teamwork, critical thinking, and immersive animal discovery. Along the way, children tackle challenges focused on key survival traits like mobility, defence, hunting and foraging. From Orangutans that use tools to Sun Bears with foraging superpowers, your child will discover real animal abilities while having a blast outdoors and connecting with nature. The day ends in an ultimate final card battle - will strategy, smarts, and wild instincts lead their team to victory?

title: Singapore Botanic Gardens: A Lush Sanctuary
blurb: Explore a lush sanctuary in the heart of the city.
description: The Singapore Botanic Gardens, a lush sanctuary near Orchard Road, is developed along a Four-Core Concept. Tanglin is the heritage core, Central is the tourist belt, and Bukit Timah is the educational zone. Tyersall-Gallop, opened in 2017, integrates with the existing rain forest. Each Core offers attractions for visitors to enjoy sights and sounds. Stroll around the Gardens and enjoy the wonderful sights and sounds the luscious greenery offers. Perfect for families and nature lovers, the gardens provide a serene escape with diverse flora and fauna.
keyword tag: garden, flower, floral, nature, trek, heritage

title: Bird Paradise
blurb: Explore a world of avian wonders at Bird Paradise.
description: Discover a vibrant sanctuary teeming with diverse bird species from around the globe. Immerse yourself in captivating exhibits, interactive experiences, and lush landscapes that showcase the beauty and importance of avian life. Perfect for families and nature enthusiasts, Bird Paradise offers an unforgettable journey into the world of birds, fostering appreciation and conservation awareness. Explore different geographical zones and witness spectacular bird shows. A family-friendly destination that combines education and entertainment, creating lasting memories for all ages. Enjoy interactive feeding sessions and learn about the unique adaptations of various bird species. This is an immersive experience for all.
keyword tag: bird, nature, zoo, wildlife, safari, animals

title: Singapore Flyer: An Immersive Journey in the Sky
blurb: See Singapore’s Story Come Alive on An Immersive Journey
description: Experience breathtaking panoramic views of Singapore's skyline and beyond from the Singapore Flyer. This iconic observation wheel offers a unique perspective of the city's landmarks, including Marina Bay Sands, Gardens by the Bay, and the Singapore River. Enjoy a leisurely ride in a spacious capsule, perfect for families and visitors of all ages. Discover the beauty of Singapore from a whole new angle, creating unforgettable memories with loved ones. The Singapore Flyer provides a captivating experience that showcases the city's vibrant culture and stunning architecture.

title: Nippon Koi Fish Farm, a serene aquatic haven
blurb: Selling Japanese Koi since 1980, outside of Japan.
description: Nippon Koi Fish Farm, established in 1980, specializes in selling exclusively Japanese Koi, making it a long-standing dealer outside of Japan. The farm offers a comprehensive range of koi-related goods suitable for both Koi and ornamental ponds. Visitors are welcome to explore the farm, which has incorporated sustainable vegetable planting to enhance and innovate its practices. A must-try is their unique Spinach Ice Cream! The farm provides an engaging experience for families interested in aquatic life and sustainable farming practices, making it an ideal destination for a family outing.

title: Kok Fah Technology Farm: Witness farm technology
blurb: Family-owned business selling leafy vegetables for 40 years.
description: Kok Fah Technology Farm is a local family-owned business that has been selling leafy vegetables in Singapore for the past 40 years. The daily operations are managed by the 3rd and 4th generations of the family, including Mr. Wong Kok Fah and his three brothers, who took over from their father in 1979. The farm is open for tours and features a bustling weekend market on its premises. Visitors can witness technology in farming and sustainability practices. This farm offers an educational experience for families, showcasing modern agricultural techniques and promoting sustainable living.
price_display: Free entry, $0.50 per fish feeding packet

title: Qian Hu Fish Farm Integrated Service Provider
blurb: Integrated service provider of ornamental fish.
description: Qian Hu Fish Farm Trading is one an integrated “one-stop” service provider ranging from farming, importing, exporting and distributing of ornamental fish. There are also Seafood retail areas at the farm. One of the most successful local farming business, Qian Hu Fish Farm also have recreational and play areas such as the Traditional Long Kang Fishing Experience and visitors can also have a guided tour when visiting. The farm offers a unique opportunity to learn about the ornamental fish industry and see the various stages of fish farming. Visitors can also enjoy recreational activities such as the Traditional Long Kang Fishing Experience.
price_display: Free entry. Longkang fishing: $7 for 30 mins, $12 for 1 hour.

title: Bollywood Farms: Countryside Surprises and Excitement
blurb: A farm full of surprises, excitement, and great fun!
description: Bollywood Farms, formerly known as Bollywood Veggies, started in 2000. The farm offers a range of surprises, excitement, and fun activities. It provides a unique countryside experience with a focus on local friendships and wider options. Visitors can explore the farm and enjoy the various offerings, making it a great destination for those seeking a fun and engaging experience. The farm is designed to be full of surprises and excitement, providing a memorable experience for all visitors. It's a place where families and friends can come together to enjoy the countryside.

title: Orchidville: Premium Orchids and Event Management
blurb: International orchid exporter with restaurant and event facilities.
description: Orchidville is a leading international exporter of premium quality commercial orchids with extensive distribution networks. In addition to orchids, Orchidville has expanded into the Food and Beverage industry with its own restaurant, Forrest, located on the premises. It also offers expertise in Event Management, providing facilities for conferences, events, and functions. Orchidville combines the beauty of orchids with dining and event services, making it a unique destination for various occasions. Visitors can enjoy the serene environment and explore the diverse offerings available.

title: Sungei Buloh Wetland Reserve Experience Nature
blurb: Discover nature's beauty at Singapore’s first ASEAN park.
description: Explore the rich biodiversity of Sungei Buloh Wetland Reserve, Singapore’s first ASEAN Heritage Park. Wander through the wetlands and an extensive mangrove forest. Originally opened as a Nature Park in 1993, 130 hectares were gazetted as a Nature Reserve in 2002. Perfect for families and nature enthusiasts, the reserve offers a unique opportunity to observe diverse flora and fauna in their natural habitat. Enjoy bird watching, guided walks, and educational exhibits suitable for all ages. Discover the wonders of the natural world in this serene and protected environment. A great place for kids to learn about nature.

title: Hay Dairies Goat Farm: Singapore's Only Goat Farm
blurb: Visit Singapore's only goat farm since 1988!
description: Hay Dairies is Singapore's only goat farm since 1988, with over 800 goats of mixed breed from Minnesota, United States. Farm tours are available, and you can purchase fresh goat milk during your visit. It's a great place for families to learn about goat farming and interact with the animals. The farm offers an educational experience for children and adults alike, providing insights into the dairy farming process. Perfect for families looking for a unique and engaging outing. Suitable for all ages, offering a fun and educational experience for everyone.
price_display: Free entry. $5 per packet for goat feeding.

title: Wings of Time Fireworks Symphony at Sentosa
blurb: A mesmerizing night show about friendship and courage.
description: Wings of Time Fireworks Symphony is the only daily fireworks show in Singapore, combining water, laser, fire, and music to create a breathtaking spectacle. Situated on Siloso Beach, this award-winning show promises an unforgettable experience for all ages. Enjoy spellbinding laser, fire, and water effects set to a majestic soundtrack, complete with a jaw-dropping fireworks display. It's a fitting end to a day out at Sentosa, offering an awe-inspiring performance for families and visitors.

title: Explore the wonders at Singapore Oceanarium today
blurb: Plan your visit to the amazing Singapore Oceanarium.
description: Discover diverse marine habitats and fascinating sea creatures at the Singapore Oceanarium. Explore various zones, from shallow waters to the deep abyss, and learn about marine life conservation. Enjoy immersive programmes, augmented and virtual reality experiences, and dining options. The Oceanarium offers an educational and entertaining experience for families and visitors of all ages, with daily schedules, visitor guides, and accessibility information available. Go beyond the surface with an expert-led tour of iconic zones, behind-the-scenes insights and more. Witness a feeding session.
keyword tag: aquarium, fish, shark, stingray, spacious, indoor, immersive

title: Singapore Flyer: Free entry for kids during school holidays

title: Dig Dig Land
blurb: Hands-on construction play for curious kids
description: Get ready for a one-of-a-kind construction adventure! Dig Dig Land is an outdoor playground where kids can live out their builder dreams across seven exciting zones. Little ones can hop into kid-sized excavators and cranes to scoop, lift, and move just like real construction pros. They’ll love digging and sculpting in the sand pits, zooming around in ride-on trucks, or trying their hand at remote-controlled vehicles. For imaginative play, there’s a mini workshed with safe tools and even a fish-tank DIY station to switch things up. With so much to explore, Dig Dig Land is the ultimate spot for kids to dig, drive, and discover through hands-on fun!

title: Science Centre Singapore Scientific Institution
blurb: Promotion of science and tech education for public.
description: The Science Centre Singapore is dedicated to promoting scientific and technological education for the general public. Located in Jurong East, it offers a variety of exhibitions, activities, and workshops designed to engage visitors of all ages. Key attractions include KidsSTOP™, Omni-Theatre, Snow City, and E.S.C. - ESCAPE @ SCIENCE CENTRE. The centre also hosts science shows, demonstrations, and competitions. With a focus on interactive learning, the Science Centre aims to inspire curiosity and foster a deeper understanding of science and technology among families and children. It provides various programmes for schools and corporate groups, ensuring an enriching experience for everyone.

With its state-of-the-art projection and sound systems, the Omni-Theatre provides a captivating experience for audiences of all ages. Perfect for families and movie enthusiasts, the Omni-Theatre offers a memorable and educational outing. Discover the wonders of the universe on a giant dome screen.

title: Snow City: Singapore's First Permanent Snow Centre
blurb: Experience real snow at Singapore's first snow centre!
description: Snow City is Singapore's first permanent snow centre, offering visitors the opportunity to experience real snow in a sub-zero environment. With a variety of snow activities, including snow tubing, snow sculptures, and a snow playground, Snow City provides a fun and unique experience for all ages. Perfect for families and those looking to escape the tropical heat, Snow City offers a memorable and exciting outing. Discover the magic of winter in the heart of Singapore. Enjoy thrilling snow activities and create lasting memories with family and friends.
datetime_display: Weekdays (except Mon): 10am – 5pm, Weekends & PH & School holidays: 10am – 6pm

blurb: Dive into animal habitats and survival traits!

The programme is designed to be both educational and fun, ensuring a memorable experience for all involved.

title: Fort Siloso Skywalk at Siloso Point, Sentosa Island
blurb: Iconic sights and historical landmarks await visitors.
description: Explore Singapore's only preserved coastal fort, a treasure trove of World War II memorabilia. Wander through the historical tunnels, gun emplacements, and interactive exhibits that bring the past to life. Ascend the Fort Siloso Skywalk for panoramic views of Sentosa and the surrounding sea. Discover the stories and sacrifices of those who defended Singapore during the war. A family-friendly destination that combines education with breathtaking scenery, offering a unique glimpse into Singapore's rich history and natural beauty. Perfect for history buffs and families alike.
datetime_display: Available daily, 9am - 10pm. Exhibits opens at 10am. Last admission to Fort Siloso & Surrender Chambers at 5.30pm

title: Imbiah Lookout Adventure Skyline Luge Singapore

description: Experience the thrill of Skyline Luge Singapore at Imbiah Lookout. Enjoy a unique wheeled gravity ride with steering and braking control. Control your speed as you ride down one of our four exciting Luge tracks. With specially designed Luge carts and helmets, it's safe and fun for all ages. Enjoy the scenic views from the Skyride as you ascend to the top.

title: Universal Studios Singapore
blurb: Adventure awaits at Universal Studios Singapore!
description: Experience thrilling rides, captivating shows, and immersive attractions at Universal Studios Singapore. Explore themed zones based on blockbuster movies and TV series. Enjoy family-friendly entertainment and create unforgettable memories. From adrenaline-pumping roller coasters to enchanting performances, there's something for everyone. Discover the magic of Hollywood and beyond. Get ready for a day of adventure and excitement at Universal Studios Singapore. Perfect for families and thrill-seekers alike. Enjoy world-class entertainment and create lasting memories.
